locale.name: en_US
locale.message: Select the option that best matches the type of the work that you are submitting.
Upload a completed prospectus file that follows the guidelines of the press' prospectus guide.

From the drop down list below, please select the category or series that best suits your submission. If you are unsure about what to select, or you haven't received special submission instructions from one of our editors, you can continue without selecting a particular series or submission category.
Click here to go to step one of the five-step submission process.
You can complete this submission at a later date by selecting Active Submissions from the Author home.
This press is not accepting submissions at this time.
Please consider waiving the Monograph Submission Fee for this monograph
Please use the comments box below to indicate why fees should be waived.
Are you sure you want to delete this incomplete submission?
Select the appropriate section for this submission (see Sections and Policies in About the Press).
If applicable, please select a category...
Indicate that this submission is ready to be considered by this press by checking off the following (comments to the editor can be added below).
You must make sure all items in the submission checklist are satisfied before continuing.
The authors agree to the terms of this Copyright Notice, which will apply to this submission if and when it is published by this press (comments to the editor can be added below).
You must agree to the terms of the Copyright Notice before continuing.
Please select an appropriate press section for this submission.
Reorder authors to appear in the order they will be listed on publication.
Provide terms for indexing the submission; separate terms with a semi-colon (term1; term2; term3).
Identify agencies that provided funding or support for the work presented in this submission.
Refers to geo-spatial location, chronological or historical coverage, and/or characteristics of research sample.
Use the hyperlinked classification system to select classification terms and, if appropriate, numbers.
At least one author is required.
The first name, last name, and email address of each author is required.
Please enter the title of your monograph.
Please enter the abstract of your monograph.
Are you sure you wish to continue without uploading a submission file?

This optional step allows Supplementary Files to be added to a submission. The files, which can be in any format, might include (a) research instruments, (b) data sets, which comply with the terms of the study's research ethics review, (c) sources that otherwise would be unavailable to readers, (d) figures and tables that cannot be integrated into the text itself, or other materials that add to the contribution of the work.
Click Save to upload file (after which additional files can be uploaded).
Are you sure you wish to continue without uploading the supplementary file you have chosen?
No supplementary files have been added to this submission.
Are you sure you want to delete this supplementary file?
To index this supplementary material, provide the following metadata for the uploaded supplementary file.
Present file to reviewers (without metadata), as it will not compromise blind review.
Use only with formally published materials.
Date when data was collected or instrument created.
Name of study or other point of origin.
Please enter the title of this supplementary file.
Public supplemental file identification already exists.

To submit your manuscript to {$pressTitle} click Finish Submission. The submission's principal contact will receive an acknowledgement by email and will be able to view the submission's progress through the editorial process by logging in to the press web site. Thank you for your interest in publishing with {$pressTitle}.
No files have been attached to this submission.
Submission complete. Thank you for your interest in publishing with {$pressName}.

If this submission is in a format that is ready to be published without further review, editing, or layout work, it can be placed directly in the last stage of the Editing queue by Clicking here. (Note: Only press editors have this option for their submissions.)

A user account is required to submit to this press. This allows our editors to track your submissions and contact you when the status of your submission changes, or if additional information is required from you.
